name: Sunday Drive (ChrsGr)
description:
You're driving home on a glorious Sunday afternoon! But beware... Everyone else on the road is getting a little bit carried away because the sun is out.


Move around with the arrow keys. You can also use WASD.

Travel as far as possible without crashing.
Hit pedestrians for extra points.
It should go without saying that running over the old lady is worth even more points.
